org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.mxml

Class MXMLData.Cursor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.mxml.MXMLData.Cursor
  • Enclosing class:
    MXMLData

    public class MXMLData.Cursor
extends Object
    A cursor represents the offset into the document and the index of the MXML unit that contains that offset
